name: rospock-node
description: Rock, Paper, Scissors game with additional weapons `lizard`,`spock` etc..

scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec tests/ && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Ziya SARIKAYA @ziyasal <sarikayaziya@gmail.com> (http://ziyasal.com)
